title: Alessandra Ambrosio dons Daisy Dukes and a plunging blouse to shop for Halloween costumes in WeHo
text:
IMG Model Alessandra Ambrósio shopped for Halloween costumes at For The Stars Fashion House in West Hollywood on Wednesday.

While inside the Melrose boutique, the 38-year-old mother-of-two looked determined as she searched through racks of sparkly clothing.

The Brazilian bombshell showcased her phenomenal 5ft9in figure in a pair of shredded Daisy Dukes, a plunging white blouse, and black slide sandals.

Boogedy-boo! IMG Model Alessandra Ambrósio shopped for Halloween costumes at For The Stars Fashion House in West Hollywood on Wednesday

Alessandra flashed a hint of her bra in the thunder bolt-print top and she scraped her brunette tresses into a messy top-bun.

After retiring from Victoria's Secret in 2017, Ambrósio ran her 2014 eponymous swimwear line ále by Alessandra before going back to modeling full-time.

At last year's spooky festivities, the GQ Middle East cover girl dressed up like a ninja, her seven-year-old son Noah dressed up like Mario, and her 11-year-old daughter Anja dressed as a twin from The Shining.

Searching: While inside the Melrose boutique, the 38-year-old mother-of-two looked determined as she searched through racks of sparkly clothing

Leggy lady: The Brazilian bombshell showcased her phenomenal 5ft9in figure in a pair of shredded Daisy Dukes, a plunging white blouse, and black slide sandals

Peek-a-boo: Alessandra flashed a hint of her bra in the thunder bolt-print top and she scraped her brunette tresses into a messy top-bun

Back it up! After retiring from Victoria's Secret in 2017, Ambrósio ran her 2014 eponymous swimwear line ále by Alessandra before going back to modeling full-time

Anja and Noah are the American Housewife actress' two children from her decade-long engagement to Re/Done denim founder Jamie Mazur, which ended in March 2018.

Perhaps Alessandra was on the lookout for a couples costume to wear with her boyfriend, Alanui co-designer Nicoló Oddi.

Ambrósio originally met her Italian stallion at HQ2 Nightclub in Atlantic City back in July 2018.

'Trick or treat!' At last year's spooky festivities, the GQ Middle East cover girl dressed up like a ninja, her seven-year-old son Noah (L) dressed up like Mario, and her 11-year-old daughter Anja (R) dressed as a twin from The Shining (pictured in 2018)

'Sunday brunch': Perhaps Alessandra was on the lookout for a couples costume to wear with her boyfriend, Alanui co-designer Nicoló Oddi (R)
description: The 38-year-old mother-of-two dressed up as a ninja last year
